title: Adding hyperlinks to search output
description: You can construct URL fields in query results so that clicking a value opens an external system (ticketing, asset DB, case management, etc.). Use string concatenation or format() to build a dynamic URL.

examples.name: Example
examples.description: Builds a URL that deep‑links into a ticketing system for the specific host and PID, making it easy to pivot from detections into workflow tools.
examples.query:
#event_simpleName=ProcessRollup2
| url := format("https://tickets.example.local/create?host=%s&pid=%s", field=[ComputerName, PID])
| select([@timestamp, ComputerName, PID, url])
